79757.<pc>は 塩水晶の洞くつの中で\nはげしく はくしゅをした！<bw_break:
<pc> furiously clapped their hands inside
of Salt Crystal Cave!<bw_break>

79758.はくしゅの音が 洞くつ内に ひびき渡り\n巨大な水晶を ふるわせていく。\nやが:
The sound of clapping echoed throughout the cave,
and resonated with the giant quartz perfectly.
Before long, heaps of quartz lumps began to fall.<bw_break>
